attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, taking trains or buses is no cheaper than the cost of petrol on many journeys. We have a major problem of traffic congestion in the UK so by reducing costs of public transport use, there will be more people willing to take buses or trains and thus reduce traffic on the roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
